title: Crockpot Pepper Steak
directions: Place the beef, bell peppers and onions in a slow cooker.
Add the seasonings, brown sugar, and soy sauce over the beef and peppers.
Pour the beef stock in the crock pot.
Cover and cook on low for 5 hours or until the steak is cooked through.
Serve over a bed of white rice.

Note: if you could like your sauce to be thicker. One hour before dinner is ready â€“ In a small bowl combine 1 tablespoon of cornstarch with a 1/4 cup of cold water. Mix together. Stir in to the crock pot. Turn the crock pot to high and let the sauce thicken for the last hour of cook time.
ingredients: 1.5 lbs of beef strips (I used thinly sliced round steaks and sliced them into strips)
